### Install and loading R packages

Two packages will be installed and loaded. They are: `plotly`, `DT`, `patchwork`,and `tidyverse`.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(plotly, DT, patchwork, tidyverse)
```

### Importing Data
```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
### Plotting
#### Plotting with native plot_ly
```{r}
plot_ly(data = exam_data,
        x = ~ENGLISH,
        y = ~MATHS,
        color = ~RACE)
```
